subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The sprint car star Ricky Stenhouse Jr. signed with Roush Fenway Racing and will move to stock cars next season. Stenhouse, who turns 20 later this month, will run the full ARCA schedule next season. Stenhouse, from Olive Branch, Miss., raced for Tony Stewart Racing this season in the National Sprint Car and National Midget Car Series. He won 2 races and had 14 top-10 finishes in 22 starts.
